mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT P WHERE PCODE IN (SELECT DISTINCT PO.PCODE FROM PRODUCT_OPTION PO,PRODUCT PP WHERE PO.PCODE=PP.PCODE AND TYPECODE LIKE '%'||NVL(#{typecode},'')||'%')

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM(SELECT p.*, (SELECT MIN(POPRICE) FROM PRODUCT_OPTION WHERE PCODE = P.PCODE) POPRICE FROM PRODUCT P WHERE PCODE IN (SELECT DISTINCT PO.PCODE FROM PRODUCT_OPTION PO,PRODUCT PP WHERE PO.PCODE=PP.PCODE AND TYPECODE LIKE '%'||#{typecode}||'%') ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(PCODE) DESC) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startrow} AND #{endrow}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM( SELECT P.*,(SELECT MIN(POPRICE) FROM PRODUCT_OPTION WHERE PCODE = P.PCODE) POPRICE FROM PRODUCT P ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(PCODE) DESC) A) WHERE MID= #{mid} AND RN BETWEEN #{startrow} AND #{endrow} AND (PTITLE LIKE '%'||#{schword}||'%' OR PCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{schword}||'%')
